alert.note: Alert for Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 5:14PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Flagler, southeastern Marion and southeastern Putnam Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 513 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pomona Park, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Crescent City, Pomona Park, Salt Springs, Andalusia, Juniper Springs, East Palatka, Fruitland, San Mateo, Satsuma and Welaka. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler
